statements: DELETE FROM PrintingProgress WHERE job_name = 'Print Document';
DELETE FROM PrintingProgress WHERE job_id = 100 AND job_name = 'PrintJob1';
DELETE FROM job_progress WHERE job_id = 123 AND progress_status = 'In Progress';
DELETE FROM print_logs WHERE log_timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND job_id IN (SELECT job_id FROM job_progress WHERE progress_status = 'Completed');
DELETE FROM JobProgress WHERE progress > 50 OR job_name = 'Print Job';
DELETE FROM printer_location WHERE location = 'Room A';
DELETE FROM printer_location WHERE printer_id = 201 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
